field.name: help
field.p: Create subscriptions to manage recurring invoicing & payments. Subscriptions can be time-bounded or not. In case of a limited period, they are flagged as to be renewed one month from the end date.
Subscriptions can be automatically generated from sales orders in Sales or eCommerce apps. To do so, set a subscription template on your subscription products.

field.name: help
field.p: Use subscriptions to follow tasks, issues, timesheets or invoicing based on work done, expenses and/or sales orders. Odoo will automatically manage the alerts for the renewal of the subscriptions to the right salesperson.

field.name: help
field.p: You will find here the subscriptions to be renewed (end date is close or passed)
Odoo automatically sets subscriptions to be renewed in a pending state. After the negotiation, the salesman should close or renew pending subscriptions.
Send a renewal quotation to the customer. When it is confirmed, the subscription is running again.
